Row.Text: Kublai Khan, grandson of Genghis Khan, you will amass an empire to rival his. You know when to bend and when to strike to gain the advantage. Your wit and political prowess will serve you, as will your martial skill in your conquests.

Kublai Khan, grandson of Genghis Khan, you will amass an empire to rival his. You know when to bend and when to strike to gain the advantage. Your wit and political prowess will serve you, as will your martial skill in your conquests.
Bà Triệu, your people will remember you as a goddess. Stand against those who would try to rein in your storm, and raise your sword in defiance. Neither family nor foe will hold you back.

One extra Economic policy slot in any government. Receive a random [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka and [ICON_CivicBoosted] Inspiration when establishing a [ICON_TradingPost] Trading Post in another Civilization's city for the first time.

A district unique to Vietnam which replaces the Encampment. +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for each adjacent district. After Flight is researched receive [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism equal to the [ICON_CULTURE] Culture output. This district does not require population, is cheaper to build, cannot be built adjacent to the city center, does not provide [ICON_GreatPerson] Great People points, and is not a specialty district.
+{1_num} [ICON_Culture] Culture from the adjacent {1_Num : plural 1?district; other?districts;}.

All land specialty districts can only be built on Rainforest, Marsh, or Woods. Receive the following yields for every building on these features: +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in Woods, +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science in Rainforest and +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in Marsh. Woods can be planted with the Medieval Faires civic.

+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength cho các đơn vị chiến đấu trong rừng mưa, đầm lầy, hoặc rừng. +1 [ICON_Movement] Chuyển động nếu họ bắt đầu lượt của mình ở đó. Cả hai phần thưởng này đều được nhân đôi nếu ô xếp là lãnh thổ của bạn.

+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for units fighting in Rainforest, Marsh, or Woods tiles. +1 [ICON_Movement] Movement if they begin their turn there. Both these bonuses are doubled if the tile is your territory.
+{1_Amount} Combat Strength from the Drive Out The Aggressors trait
+{1_Amount} Combat Strength from the Drive Out The Aggressors trait

Vietnamese unique Medieval era ranged unit that replaces the Crossbowman. These units have additional movement and can move after attacking. They are also stronger when defending, more expensive, and have greater sight.
Grants up to 3 [ICON_Housing] Housing based on Appeal. Culture bombs adjacent neutral tiles, and increases their Appeal by 1.

Grants +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith to adjacent unimproved Charming tiles. Increased to +2 [ICON_FOOD] Food, +2 [ICON_FAITH] Faith, +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for adjacent unimproved Breathtaking tiles.

Grants +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold to adjacent unimproved Charming tiles. Increased to +2 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science, +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold, +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for adjacent unimproved Breathtaking tiles.

Control, improve, and expand upon your Luxury resources! The Monopolies and Corporations mode enables you to build profitable Industries around Luxury resources, found Corporations to further their development, and manufacture unique Products to secure your place in capitalist history.
